creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Kenneth S. Carpenter
medium: Watercolor and black chalk on paper
provenance: Estate of Dr. James Klein, Zurich. (Gallery Actarus, Zurich, 1949). (Maxwell Galleries, San Francisco; sold, March 28, 1970 for TTOO to Carpenter); Mr. and Mrs. Kenneth S. Carpenter, Washington D.C. (1970-93); given to MIA, 1993.
signed: Signed in black chalk, lower right: Paul Signac
title: On The Bank of the River
